data.eml:eml: Notes on Hexapodidae (Crustacea, Brachyura) from Indonesia and Malaysia, with description of a new species of Mariaplax Rahayu & Ng, 2014, from Lombok, Indonesia

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ng, Peter K. L., Rahayu, Dwi Listyo (2015): Notes on Hexapodidae (Crustacea, Brachyura) from Indonesia and Malaysia, with description of a new species of Mariaplax Rahayu & Ng, 2014, from Lombok, Indonesia. Zootaxa 3981 (1): 125-137, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3981.1.7
